entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as a person who failed to recover Moody's body. He is also mentioned in conversation with Lupin and Harry.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as a person who failed to recover Moody's body. He is also mentioned in conversation with Bill and Harry.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who died during the battle. His body was not recovered by Bill and Lupin.

entities.name: the daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that has not reported on Moody's death or the recovery of his body.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as someone who does not want to admit that Voldemort is powerful. He is also the Minister of Magic.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a powerful person who attacked Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who was attacked by Voldemort. He is also in conversation with Bill and Lupin.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as someone who shakes his head in response to Harry's question about the hearing.

relationships.description: Bill and Lupin failed to recover Moody's body after his death.
Scrimgeour does not want to admit that Voldemort is powerful.
Azkaban allowed a mass breakout of Death Eaters, who were likely working for Voldemort.
